ratings.comment: Fengxia filled in for a prof for this class and did well. Her lectures were straight forward, she always answered HW questions in class. Lots of homework, but exams are based right off the HW. Always available outside of class. Genuinely a nice lady who wants her students to succeed. Offered a lot of extra credit.

Lectures can become kind of confusing but all of the lecture slides are posted online after class. The homework and tests are very similar so studying for the exams is very easy. Overall an easy class even if you have no econ background.

Prof. Dong moved very fast in her lectures, but a lot is taken from the textbook and all lecture slides are posted. There is a homework assignment (kinda long) before each exam and the exams are EXACTLY the same, so work to get the homework correct (correct answers are given). Very easy if you have previous Econ background.
